title: Mark Tufo - Zombie Fallout 7: For the Fallen (Audiobooks)
description:
Hi,

Before I get to the audiobook I want to talk to you about something called The Internet.
I think we can all agree that if you really like something someone made you will eventually buy it, but the fact is that they're forcing us to buy stuff at ridiculous prizes. You can hardly find anything illegal on google or other search engines and with internet profits going through the roof audible and partners still dare to ask crazy prizes even though profits have never been higher. I'm sorry but 25 dollars for one audiobook is just insane, even if the book is made by awesome Mark Tufo. I don't mind paying for Mark Tufo's books because I really enjoy them but that doesn't mean audible can just rip my dick off. If we really wanna keep the option of free stuff we have to keep sharing.

Just my 2 cents.

Now about the new Mark Tufo book:


Mark Tufo - Zombie Fallout Series (Audiobooks):

Collected and uploaded by: Jimi88 - Netherlands
-----------------------------------------------

7) For the Fallen:
------------------
Mike is back. The battle with Eliza is past. 
Now Mike must strike out once again in a desperate race against time as his son 
and best friend are succumbing to the zombie virus within them. 
What he does not know is that an old foe hasrisen up and a more insidious threat has emerged 
to not just the Talbots but all of humanity. 

------------------
Narrator: Sean Runnette
Listening Length: 10 hours and 55 minutes
Program Type: Audiobook
Version: Unabridged
Publisher: Mark Tufo
Audible.com Release Date: November 12, 2013
Language: English
ASIN: B00GIYDPEK
----------------

I give these series an 9/10 because it's a great read/listen and even though the massive lenght never seems to bore the reader/listener.
Together with Warm Bodies, The Armageddon Series and The Morningstar Strain this series is in my personal top 10.

Have Fun and if you love the audiobook buy the paper! 

Greetz Jimi

PS. I haven't listened to this new one yet so please comment on the quality.
